body_html:
Hi @vrv,

Yes, if you are interested, I want to get it committed. This change followed my investigation into a bug, where I discovered that memory usage is not optimal for data format NCHW. From what I see, this optimization still applies to the current conv_ops.cc.

Anyway, in the meantime I changed countries, and I lost the GPU that I used for dev. So I need a few days to find a GPU card and set up a new dev environment.

body:
Hi @vrv,

Yes, if you are interested, I want to get it committed. This change followed my investigation into a bug, where I discovered that memory usage is not optimal for data format NCHW. From what I see, this optimization still applies to the current conv_ops.cc.

Anyway, in the meantime I changed countries, and I lost the GPU that I used for dev. So I need a few days to find a GPU card and set up a new dev environment.
